data.title: Reinforcement Learning For Simulating Personal Navigation UAV
data.body: An academic research project for our Machine Learning course. The project aims to develop a model that is capable of navigating and following its owner. The model is trained in an Unity virtual environment.

data.title: ChatTalkCGC: A Responsive Platform For Guidance and Counselling of Academic and Non-Academic Matters in MCM
data.body: An academic research project for IT129, IT104P, and CS140-2P that aims to provide a platform for students and the MCM's Office of Student Services to communicate. SCOPUS publication.
